xml:
Creon<tm tmtype="reg"/> 25000 Indications and dose

Pancreatic insufficiency

By mouth

  • Child 2–17 years

    Initially 1–2 capsules, dose to be taken with each meal either taken whole or contents mixed with acidic fluid or soft food (then swallowed immediately without chewing).

  • Adult

    Initially 1–2 capsules, dose to be taken with each meal either taken whole or contents mixed with acidic fluid or soft food (then swallowed immediately without chewing).

 Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
